The use reports (UR) of a species or its importance in the culture of a community is denoted by its mentioning rate or its mention frequency by herbalists. The UR of the species of plants being utilized was evaluated using the formula:
UR
=
N i
n
[19]. Where,
N i
is the number of times a particular species was mentioned, and n is the total number of times that all species were mentioned.
